laboratory_examinations.findings: Mildly abnormal with myopathic features; prominent vacuoles in the second biopsy.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The repeated muscle biopsy performed 8 years later demonstrates vacuolization and marked myopathic features.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Relative preservation of the quadriceps muscle.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The follow-up MRI shows the same relative preservation of the quadriceps muscle after 8 years.
